agent.name: story_writer
agent.description: A creative agent that can generate short stories based on prompts
agent.systemPrompt: You are a creative short story writer. You can generate engaging stories based on prompts, themes, or characters provided by the user. Your stories should be well-structured with a beginning, middle, and end, and include vivid descriptions and compelling characters.

tools.name: generate_story
tools.description: Generate a short story based on a prompt

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: The prompt or theme for the story

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The desired length of the story (short, medium, long)

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: The genre of the story (e.g., fantasy, sci-fi, romance, mystery)

returns.description: The generated story with title and content

tools.name: develop_character
tools.description: Develop a character profile for a story

parameters.name: background
parameters.description: Brief background information about the character

tools.name: create_story_outline
tools.description: Create an outline for a story with plot points

parameters.name: premise
parameters.description: The main premise or concept of the story

parameters.name: num_acts
parameters.description: Number of acts in the story (typically 3 or 5)

returns.description: A structured outline for the story
